documents.document: "You never grow in good times" - thank you Myles Monroe
I live for my legacy.
Make every moment count...life is short!
Cannot sleep? Use your imagination to create your next big thing....
Cannot sleep? Work
Cannot sleep? Read
Cannot sleep? Pray
Work when your energy is the highest.
I'm preparing for marriage as I wait.
I am grateful for a change in my perspective.
Goal is to read 55 books this year..about 1 per week.
I'm too busy focusing on my legacy.
Father help me to wait well.
Be honest and you can be free....
Slow down, reflect and revise whenever necessary.
Judge yourself and you will never judge others.
Always balance fun into all you do...
Happiness to me: living the life of my dreams - as I please.....
Make everything humorous....thank you Chris Tucker
Watch and listen you will learn a lot - thank you Jennifer Lawrence....
Jennifer Lawrence thank you, "I give no thought to fear - I keep going until I get it"....
Business will never end when you do what others won't - be vulnerable - be trustworthy - be honest - have integrity - always.
I love education - because education is the foundation of all we achieve and all we are.
You don't need to move fast - you just need to MOVE.
If you are willing to learn anything - you can do anything.
Learn all you can - you will grow at an intensified rate.... Thank you John Maxwell....
In Real Estate: never stop following up - thank you Epic Real Estate Podcast.....
Working - while listening to some great podcasts - life is good. Thank you for wisdom, knowledge and understanding.
At this point in my life...age 40...If I don't love it, I don't do it! If I don't want to do it, I don't !
I created my business model in my own unique way - be authentic, be you and have fun!
Kill your distractions and you will advance in LIFE.
I'd rather live fearless versus fearful....
"Worry is a complete waste of time" - thank you Joyce Meyer.
Changing your diet (eating well) - more than mere exercise can help you lose weight - thank you TD Jakes.
Love yourself - forgive yourself daily if necessary. Then get moving towards your legendary life!
Do you have any idea how important self-love is??
Sacrifice is never easy - but very worth it.
The more money I save - the more we can save, invest and allow our money to grow....
"Write what you know and people will forever love you" - thank you Quincy Jones....
Love the world and the world will love you back - guaranteed.
Do what you love - follow your heart - don't chase money.
Authenticity is my brand - be real always - people love and respect - real-ness. Just be real, not fake - be real!
Authenticity is valuable to your audience. Show your weaknesses and your strengths.
I see myself as a pioneer - I don't want to follow - I want to lead - I want to make all things new...my own way. - that's magic.
We must push past our fears - but not allowing the emotion to control us....
Fear nothing and you can do anything... Do anything have no fears....
Waste your time - and you waste your life...
You were created to influence your world - thank you Myles Monroe (this man is brilliant to me)....
When you make a mistake - forgive yourself quickly and move on with your life - thank you Myles Monroe.
Imagine it in your mind - take action on that idea - and you will see results. Thank you for legacy.
Use your mistakes - to maximize your potential in the future - thank you Evan Carmichael
You have all power - you decide to give it away!
What's next for me: book # 3, new house, 2 dogs.....#smiling.
Listening to the Dave Ramsey podcast - best way to start my day - the way I always start my day ðŸ¤£- next Chris Brown "True Stewardship".....
I love being a woman - I love our power, our love, our strength. And how we change the world.....
I don't know how many books I will write in my life time - but I have so many stories to tell - #49
Knowing your distractions is good - you know what to ignore.
We must pray for Donald Trump not condemn him. Support him, stand beside him, hate doesn't bring the best healing.
You will know I am here - because I will make my mark!
Work Hard + Be Diligent + Accomplish Goals + Have Fun + Implement Balance = Good LIFE
My visions are the dreams that keep coming back - that is why I am here - thank you Myles Monroe.
I am grateful for simplicity....thank you Myles Monroe
Have a narrow focus - focus on your call, your assignment, your purpose - thank you Myles Monroe.
Vision controls your choices - I am grateful for good choices - thank you Myles Monroe....
Vision simplifies life - thank you Myles Monroe
When you focus on vision - you will overcome distractions - thank you Myles Monroe....
I am grateful for every follower -- I'm living to inspire and empower you and those you know!
I have crossed over to the other side....
I am learning to kill my impulsiveness.
I am learning to be silent is good....
Preparing for marriage little by little...
A new "me" is unfolding...
I am here to change my world....
Live free so you can fly.
Love others deeply
Love the ability to empower and inspire...,
Very excited about my 5 minute video platform....
Practice creates perfection
I am thankful for a legendary legacy
Reading: "Emotionally Healthy Spirituality" by: Peter Scazzero
Do what you think you cannot...
What I think of me...matters most...
I believe in the power of diligence....
Pray for our president daily! As a nation we must unite!
I don't have or need to be perfect to love me...ðŸ˜Ž
You were born to be great
You were born to overcome your enemies....
I believe in my legacy....do you believe in yours??
Do your best with what you have....
Women get inside a mans mind before you let him in your body #celibatelife
I will be on the radio one day...talking to billions of people....
I set the bar high...so I will reach high...
My income goal is: $250K yearly by 2021.
Respect yourself and others will too..
Love yourself and others will too...
I am grateful for self-love...it's beautiful....
The less I talk..the more I do...
The less I talk the more I hear...
I am here to soar...
Always remember: people treat you the way you allow...
